Question
========
A group of students are shown four films.  
For each film, the students must indicate on a scale of 1 to 10 indicate how instructive they found the film.  
What analysis technique should we use to determine which film was the most instructive was found by the students?

Answerlist
----------
* Repeated-measures ANOVA
* One-way ANOVA
* Mixed-design ANOVA
* MANOVA

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
